comment.body: i would love to have it there, too

http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroLSTN.bit    -    Not Found
/ZeroLSTN.bit    -    i hope it's just me, but other new *.bit sites unknown to my zeronet instance work (i didn't find you on zeromail)

@Git Center: is there a use case for anything-else-than-[content.json] in zeronet? If not this could be a bug report. (could not search with wildcards on [{clearnet link} https://readthedocs.org/search/?q=*content.json&type=file&project=zeronet&version=latest] so i did it by hand, i found no mentions of anything prepending anything else to content.json
